abstract: The U.S. Justice Department has begun looking at big telecom companies such as AT&T and Verizon Communications to try to determine if they have abused their market power, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: The U.S. Justice Department has begun looking at big telecom companies such as AT&T and Verizon Communications to try to determine if they have abused their market power, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: The United States Justice Department has begun looking at big telecom companies like AT&T and Verizon Communications to try to determine if they have abused their market power, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Justice Department Said to Weigh Telecom Inquiry
